Text: Almost forgot my disclaimer: I didn't scan/purchase any of the comics included here. Credit goes to the uploaders who posted them and the respective groups they belong to.

Sorry for the lack of seeding from my end, everyone. I lost my house this week, and had to get rid of my laptop, but I'm looking into a new place closer to my work, and a more permanent computer situation simultaneously- will be able to seed constantly within the next few weeks. 

You few who are hanging on, keep it up; I still have the original torrent on backup, and will rejoin you as soon as I can.

since there are so many leechers and not a lot of seeders, we really ought to coordinate this. for example, if you're at anywhere under 95%, you should stop leeching for a while so those people above that can finish quickly and seed.
sitting @ 99.7% with an infinite ETA.... argggg.
If everyone else is in the same boat, once you get to 99.74%, all thats remaining will be "I, Vampire" #'s 9 & 13. Perhaps just get them somewhere else...? I'll keep seeding what I have.
